OOC: Okay. For Neo Beast Wars. Well, I can't name anything, but I liked eve=
rything you've done so far. For DBZSF, you've really helped me and Orchid a=
long. You were also our first member, and we might not have kept our hope i=
f not for your posts. We eventually got more members, but you still remaine=
d among the elite best. That's what you did great for Neo Beast Wars, had s=
pectacularly great posts that bewilder the mind with beautiful but realisti=
c fantasy...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: LurkerAbyss Sucks 
  =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 20, 2001 8:11 PM
  Subject=
: Re: Surrender


  OOC: LOL!  " Lurker, you've done many great things for =
Neo Beast Wars and DBZSF..."????????!!!!  Name one thing....Come on all, na=
me at least ONE thing.......
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Ro=
land the Gunslinger 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July=
 20, 2001 8:02 PM
    Subject: Re: Surrender


    OOC: *Sigh*, there he go=
es again. Unless your name is Thriller 7, Mew, WorldInd, Dogg00, FRKBOY, Re=
d Convoy, or MathWizard, there is no reason you shouldn't be respected, esp=
ecially by yourself. I think you're awesome, Lurker, you've done many great=
 things for Neo Beast Wars and DBZSF...
